resources.string:
Thank you for downloading my app. My intention
 is for this to be a companion to other forms of
 therapy. Like many people across the world, I've
 struggled with varying degrees of depression and
 anxiety and often feel myself getting to my lowest
 points in the middle of long shifts at work or doing
 daily tasks. I decided to make this to provide
 motivational support here and there. Every little bit
 helps and I hope for others out there like me, this
 little bit can provide some measure of comfort.

 -Daniel
